title: How do cell phones use technology? - Quora

response.answer_text: In the most basic form, a cell phone is essentially a two-way radio, consisting of a radio transmitter and a radio receiver. When you chat with your friend on your cell phone, your phone converts your voice into an electrical signal, which is then transmitted via radio waves to the nearest cell tower

Today there are gigantic mobile companies that have made revolution by adding amazing video AI App on their product.You can see more details in Sensifai | Video AI | Image Recognition | Video Analysis.Please check very useful demo in SensifaiDemo.
